docs.title: http.video
docs.text: Welcome to the http.video knowledge base. This repository contains links to tools, tips, and tricks related to media streaming.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Discover resources and tools that can help you get started with media streaming.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This knowledge base is structured into various sections to help you navigate through different aspects of media streaming.

docs.title: Media Preparation - Encoding
docs.text: This section covers tools and resources for encoding media files.

docs.title: FFmpeg
docs.text:
Here's an example of encoding a video file using FFmpeg:

ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -c:v libx264 -crf 23 -preset medium -c:a aac -b:a 128k output.mp4

docs.title: Macro Syntax Error
docs.text:
File: media-standards.md

Line 7 in Markdown file: expected token 'end of print statement', got 'gpp'

- [3GPP]({{ extra.3gpp }})
